sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A godly and learned sermon, vpon the 91. psalme Declaring how, and to what place, a Christian man ought to flie in the daungerous time of the pestilence, for his best safetie and deliuerance. By T.C. VVher-unto are ioyned, certaine fruitfull prayers, very necessarie for the time of infection. T. C., fl. 1603.
[52] p.
Printed [by E. Allde] for Edward White, dwelling neere the little north doore of S. Pauls Church, at the signe of the Gun, London : 1603.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-C D² . Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
